strapiPost.title: Celebrate Turpentine Creek's 31st Anniversary with Carole Baskin
strapiPost.content:
The Turpentine Creek Wildlife Refuge is celebrating their 31st anniversary with a "Feast with the Beasts" event, and they've invited Carole Baskin of “Tiger King” fame to join them as the keynote speaker!

  • Celebrate: Taking place Apr 29 from 3:30-8p, the event will feature happy hour in the Discovery Area, a special tram tour, dinner and live music.
  • Support: Tickets are limited, so grab yours soon. Proceeds go toward the animals of the refuge, and never-before-seen footage of their rescues will be shared.

Find out more from the Turpentine Creek Wildlife Refuge event HERE.
